Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board -- 1/2% S&U Tax Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School Board Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one per cent (1/2%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), all as defined by law (an estimated $1,350,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years from and after July 1, 2020, with the avails or proceeds of the Tax to be used to acquire, improve, maintain, operate and support the public elementary and secondary schools within the Parish and for any other School Board purposes and continuing the laptop program to the high school students and including a state mandated foreign language program for elementary and middle school students?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Consolidated School Dist. No. 1 -- 3.75 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated School District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of three and seventy-five hundredths (3.75) mills (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,443,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031 solely for the purpose of paying salaries and benefits to all employees covered by the local instructional and non-instructional salary schedules?
